scenes.description: Pre-show announcement over a slide showing flower stands from fans.
Informational slideshow featuring fan flower stands, concert merchandise, and venue regulations set to background music.

subtitles.original: それでは、開演まで今しばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english: So then, please wait a little longer until the show starts.

Attention

Attention
Please cooperate by wearing a mask.
Please refrain from cheering out loud during the performance.
Please refrain from moving seats during the performance.

subtitles.original:
Attention
COCOAを使用していただくため携帯電話の電源はお切りにならずマナーモードに設定をお願いいたします。
撮影・録音・録画は禁止とさせていただきます。

Attention
Please do not turn off your phone and set it to silent mode for COCOA.
Photography, audio recording, and filming are prohibited.
